name: Doctor D
effectText: Banish 1 "Destiny HERO" monster from your GY; add to your hand or Special Summon 1 "Destiny HERO" monster from your GY. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 2 "Destiny HERO" monsters you control; choose 1 of those monsters, its ATK becomes the other monster's ATK, until the end of this turn.
